title: willbe carried out under my supervision
clause_text: willbe carried out under my supervision. All the materials (type and grade) and the workmanship of the work will generally tally with the general specifications submitted along with the plans and the work will be carried out according to the sanctioned plans. I shall be responsible for the execution of the work in all respects. I have submitted a proposal on behalf of my/our client Shri/M/s. for the proposed development on the above referred plot.
